trans-unit.source: htmlArea RTE > Remove Format
trans-unit.target: htmlArea RTE > Remove Format

trans-unit.source: The Remove Format feature offers options for cleaning up the HTML markup of the text being edited.
trans-unit.target: The Remove Format feature offers options for cleaning up the HTML markup of the text being edited.

trans-unit.source: EXT:rtehtmlarea/extensions/RemoveFormat/skin/images/remove-format.gif
trans-unit.target: EXT:rtehtmlarea/extensions/RemoveFormat/skin/images/remove-format.gif
trans-unit.note: This string contains an internal text, which must not be changed. Just copy the original text into the translation field. For more information have a look at the Tutorial.

trans-unit.source: Remove format icon in the editor tool bar.
trans-unit.target: Remove format icon in the editor tool bar.

trans-unit.source: xEXT_rtehtmlarea_RemoveFormat:area,xEXT_rtehtmlarea_RemoveFormat:options
trans-unit.target: xEXT_rtehtmlarea_RemoveFormat:area,xEXT_rtehtmlarea_RemoveFormat:options
trans-unit.note: This string contains an internal text, which must not be changed. Just copy the original text into the translation field. For more information have a look at the Tutorial.

trans-unit.source: Select the area to be cleaned
trans-unit.target: Select the area to be cleaned

trans-unit.source: The format removal operation may be applied either to the currently highlighted text or to the whole contents of the editing area.
trans-unit.target: The format removal operation may be applied either to the currently highlighted text or to the whole contents of the editing area.

trans-unit.source: Use one of these two radio buttons to select the area to which you wish to apply the format removal operation.
trans-unit.target: Use one of these two radio buttons to select the area to which you wish to apply the format removal operation.

trans-unit.source: Remove format on selected text only
trans-unit.target: Remove format on selected text only

trans-unit.source: Select this option to perform the format removal operation on the currently selected text only.
trans-unit.target: Select this option to perform the format removal operation on the currently selected text only.

trans-unit.source: xEXT_rtehtmlarea_RemoveFormat:area
trans-unit.target: xEXT_rtehtmlarea_RemoveFormat:area
trans-unit.note: This string contains an internal text, which must not be changed. Just copy the original text into the translation field. For more information have a look at the Tutorial.

trans-unit.source: Remove format on all contents
trans-unit.target: Remove format on all contents

trans-unit.source: Select this option to perform the format removal operation on the whole contents of the editing area.
trans-unit.target: Select this option to perform the format removal operation on the whole contents of the editing area.

trans-unit.source: xEXT_rtehtmlarea_RemoveFormat:area
trans-unit.target: xEXT_rtehtmlarea_RemoveFormat:area
trans-unit.note: This string contains an internal text, which must not be changed. Just copy the original text into the translation field. For more information have a look at the Tutorial.

trans-unit.source: Select the types of format to be removed
trans-unit.target: Select the types of format to be removed

trans-unit.source: The format removal operation may remove various types of format.
trans-unit.target: The format removal operation may remove various types of format.

trans-unit.source: Check one or more of these check boxes to select the type(s) of format you wish to be removed.
trans-unit.target: Check one or more of these check boxes to select the type(s) of format you wish to be removed.

trans-unit.source: xEXT_rtehtmlarea_RemoveFormat:htmlFormat,xEXT_rtehtmlarea_RemoveFormat:msWordFormat,xEXT_rtehtmlarea_RemoveFormat:typographicalPunctuation,xEXT_rtehtmlarea_RemoveFormat:nonBreakingSpace,xEXT_rtehtmlarea_RemoveFormat:images,xEXT_rtehtmlarea_RemoveFormat:allHtml
trans-unit.target: xEXT_rtehtmlarea_RemoveFormat:htmlFormat,xEXT_rtehtmlarea_RemoveFormat:msWordFormat,xEXT_rtehtmlarea_RemoveFormat:typographicalPunctuation,xEXT_rtehtmlarea_RemoveFormat:nonBreakingSpace,xEXT_rtehtmlarea_RemoveFormat:images,xEXT_rtehtmlarea_RemoveFormat:allHtml
trans-unit.note: This string contains an internal text, which must not be changed. Just copy the original text into the translation field. For more information have a look at the Tutorial.

trans-unit.source: Remove all HTML inline markup and style
trans-unit.target: Remove all HTML inline markup and style

trans-unit.source: Check this option if you wish to remove all HTML inline markup and style.
trans-unit.target: Check this option if you wish to remove all HTML inline markup and style.

trans-unit.source: Remove all MS Word markup and style
trans-unit.target: Remove all MS Word markup and style

trans-unit.source: Check this option if you wish to remove all MS Word markup and style.
trans-unit.target: Check this option if you wish to remove all MS Word markup and style.

trans-unit.source: Replace typographical punctuation
trans-unit.target: Replace typographical punctuation

trans-unit.source: Check this option if you wish to replace typographical punctuation with ASCII character codes.
trans-unit.target: Check this option if you wish to replace typographical punctuation with ASCII character codes.

trans-unit.source: Replace non-breaking spaces
trans-unit.target: Replace non-breaking spaces

trans-unit.source: Check this option if you wish to replace non-breaking spaces with normal spaces.
trans-unit.target: Check this option if you wish to replace non-breaking spaces with normal spaces.

trans-unit.source: This option replaces any non-breaking space with a simple normal space.
trans-unit.target: This option replaces any non-breaking space with a simple normal space.

trans-unit.source: Remove images
trans-unit.target: Remove images

trans-unit.source: Check this option if you wish to remove all images.
trans-unit.target: Check this option if you wish to remove all images.

trans-unit.source: This option removes all images from the selected text.
trans-unit.target: This option removes all images from the selected text.

trans-unit.source: Remove all HTML format
trans-unit.target: Remove all HTML format

trans-unit.source: Check this option if you wish to remove all HTML format.
trans-unit.target: Check this option if you wish to remove all HTML format.

trans-unit.source: This option removes all HTML markup from the selected text.
trans-unit.target: This option removes all HTML markup from the selected text.
